page.title: 11BANK HOLIDAY ACTIVITIES
page.content: On May Day Bank Holiday my brother Matthew and I went to a Cub Woodrow Trophy Competition. We did a lot of things there. We did an obstacle course, nature observation, tent pitching, fire lighting, compass trails and First Aid. We had different names for the day. My group was called Earwigs. There were lots of other groups. I lost my cap there. ______________________________________ I woke up a 7 a.m. and read three chapters of Wind in the Willows.I then watched Breakfast T.V. for a while, and then we had breakfast. After washing up we all got into the car.We went to a nursery to get some plants. When we had collected the plants and looked around for a bit, we went home to put the plants in the garden. After that we went to Pitch Hill for a walk and a picnic.
